thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Very friendly and professional. All my questions were answered and turn around was amazing. Price was reasonable vs some of the local stores. Shipping was a turn off at first but when I received it no complains as it was worth every penny so that the mat was pristine. Thank you
